modelleertaal.modelregels: 'opgave 13 Model W6 Coulomb r = sqrt(x^2 + y^2) Fc = ... 'vul aan Fresx = ... 'vul aan ax = Fresx / ms dvx = ax * dt vx = vx + dvx dx = vx * dt x = x + dx Fresy = ...'vul aan ay = Fresy / ms dvy = ay * dt vy = vy + dvy dy = vy * dt y = y + dy t = t + dt
